content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (-13.0, -48.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -50.0) supplying iron ore.
- Wooden Chest at position (-14.5, -48.5) storing extracted iron ore.
- Stone Furnace at position (-13.0, -48.0) processing iron ore into iron plates.
- Iron Chest at position (-14.5, -47.5) for storing intermediate products.
- Burner Inserters at positions (-14.5, -46.5) and (-14.5, -45.5) for transferring materials between entities.

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (-11.0, -48.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (-11.0, -48.0) processing iron ore into iron plates.

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (-9.0, -48.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (-9.0, -48.0) processing iron ore into iron plates.

### Coal and Iron Ore Extraction Facility at Position (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (41.0, -82.0) extracting coal.
- Iron Chest at position (41.5, -80.5) storing extracted coal.
- Stone Furnace at position (43.0, -82.0) processing raw materials.
- Burner Inserter at position (43.5, -80.5) for transferring materials between entities.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items without sufficient inventory
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into another entity.

### Inserters waiting for source items
- Check the supply chain to ensure that source items are available for inserters to function properly. This may involve ensuring that chests and furnaces have sufficient materials.
